channel.title: [VFM] Vanilla Nightless FM - Ice Cream Flavor: Day 6 - The Mafia Win!
channel.description:
# Welcome to Vanilla Nightless FM - Ice Cream Flavor! https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/686758566677315618/690609112181899294/Ice20cream.png # Hosted By @Marshal <small>Cohosted by @SirDerpsAlot</small> ## Rules 1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. Follow the Official™ Forum™ Mafia™ and™ Forum™ of™ Lies™ Rules™ by Luxy the Moderator 3. If you haven’t posted on-topic, substantive, game-related content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 4. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 5. Do not quote private host messages. *This includes copypasting* 6. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose. 7. Refrain from spamposting. 8. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 9. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 10. Lets all have fun and play together! 11. Do not edit or delete made posts. 12. Do not like posts in the thread when you would not be able to speak in there normally.
## Gameplay * Days will be 48 hours long * Executions will be Majority and Plurality * Players must make at least 10 game-relevant posts each day phase or will be prodded and/or replaced. * No lynch **WILL NOT** be in effect. All ties will be randed between the two(or 3, or 12) tied players. * When game is in LyLo, votes *will* be locked. * Flavor will be randed separately from alignment. * And yes, mafia have a daychat
## Special Mechanic
I have heard some people complain about reading a lot of messages after signing up for a game because a few people tend to post a lot of messages and things get chaotic(whoops).
This is why i am instituting a **101 post per day phase limit**, which will be **Lifted an hour before EoD**. This game is intended to be a lighter thing that isn't intended to have a large amount of posts clogging the thread. Going over this limit accidentally will result in a warning. Going over even after a warning or intentionally exceeding the limit will result in a **[color=red] MODKILL[/color]**
## Classlist
[Color=green]Vanilla Townie[/color] [Color=green]Vanilla Townie[/color] [Color=green]Vanilla Townie[/color] [Color=green]Vanilla Townie[/color] [Color=green]Vanilla Townie[/color] [Color=green]Vanilla Townie[/color] [Color=green]Vanilla Townie[/color] [Color=green]Vanilla Townie[/color] [Color=Red]Mafia Goon[/color] [Color=Red]Mafia Goon[/color] [Color=Red]Mafia Goon[/color] [Color=Red]Mafia Goon[/color]
## Playerlist
1. Sulit 3. ~~Vulgard~~ ~~katze~~ **im not creative dead d4 - [color=red]Pistachio Ice Cream, Mafia Goon[/color]** 4. ~~Hippolytus~~ **dead d6 - [color=TOWN]** 5. ~~DryBones~~ **Jumped into the blizzard D2 - [color = green]Butter Pecan Ice Cream, Vanilla Townie[/color]** 6. DatBird 7. Napoleon **uh died d3** - **[color=green]Vanilla Ice Cream, Vanilla Townie[/color]** 8. ~~Eevee~~ Geyde 9. Universal 10. EVO 11. Wazza 12. ~~Nightfall~~ - **Pushed out into the blizzard D1 - [color = green]Coffee Ice Cream, Vanilla Townie[/color]** 22. ~~Appelsiini~~ **something something died d5 - [color=green] Chocolate Ice Cream, Vanilla Townie[/color]**
# Back-ups(subs) 1. Katze 8856781. Mist1422 5. Geyde
# Spectators(will be informed) 1. Jgoesgaming 2. Arete ___ # Game will start... *now*

item.title: [VFM] Vanilla Nightless FM - Ice Cream Flavor: Day 6 - The Mafia Win!
item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
pocketing doesn’t have to be “Wow let’s be best freinds forever”

it can be as simple as taking someones side on an argument or publicly expressing your feelings on a stance that you know they have

did this relentlessly with arete in poisonous (all of those fake mindmelds and “ugh le wolves be slanking amirite”) and i’d say i did pretty well.

Read full topic

item.title: [VFM] Vanilla Nightless FM - Ice Cream Flavor: Day 6 - The Mafia Win!
item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
the real strat is to just have hyper self awareness and try to make everything you do look townie or push agenda secretly

also never underestimate the power of pockets and fake mindmelds

BoTF2 was full of me doing small things that were villagery that led up to me not being yeeted

Read full topic
